Class DomSubtreeReader

All Implemented Interfaces:
org.xml.sax.XMLReader
public class DomSubtreeReader
extends AbstractXmlReader
implements org.xml.sax.XMLReader

A DomSubtreeReader implement a SAX 2 XMLReader interface for supplying DocumentFragment content as SAX events.
